doc:
Bruce Hubbard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Hubbard 0 Bruce Hubbard (1952 − 12 November 1991) was an American operatic baritone. A Drama Desk and Laurence Olivier Award nominee for Best Actor, he performed on Broadway, the Metropolitan Opera, BBC television, in concert and made several recordings. He is most famous for appearing as Joe in Show Boat, and as Jake, as well as Porgy, in Porgy and Bess on Broadway, the West End, and in several major opera houses and regional theatres. He graduated from the Indiana University School of Music. Bruce_Hubbard ( 1952 − 12_November_1991 ) was an_American_operatic_baritone . A_Drama_Desk and Laurence_Olivier_Award_nominee for Best_Actor , he performed on Broadway , the_Metropolitan_Opera , BBC_television , in concert and made several_recordings . He is most_famous for appearing as Joe in Show_Boat , and as Jake , as_well_as Porgy , in Porgy_and_Bess on Broadway , the_West_End , and in several_major_opera_houses and regional_theatres . He graduated from the_Indiana_University_School of Music .
